original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1016)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(786)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(102)@</color> 秒內對範圍內敵方武將造成每秒 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(102)@</color> 體力的中毒狀態。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1016)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(786)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage to the enemy in the front range, and in <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(102)@</color> within seconds, inflicts every second to the enemy generals in the range <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(102)@</color> Poisoning status of physical strength.
